Export Clip Audio Files

Exports clips to wave files. The clips are specified as a set of one or more detectors, one or more station/mic combinations, and a range of dates. The wave files are written to the specified output directory on the server. The export runs as a Vesper job. [In the future, you will be able to choose the classes of clips to be exported. The clips will also be delivered via your browser rather than via the server file system.]
